answers.a: In food additives, PVP means polyvinylpyrrolidone (E1201), a synthetic, water‑soluble polymer used as a stabiliser, emulsifier, and thickener.
In gaming, PVP means player versus player and is unrelated to foods; in this context, PVP refers to polyvinylpyrrolidone (E1201).
It’s a complex of polyvinylpyrrolidone (PVP) and iodine used as a topical antiseptic, not as a food additive.

answers.q: is povidone iodine the same as betadine
answers.a: Betadine is a brand of povidone‑iodine solution, so they are essentially the same (brand vs generic).
